pages.text: Exploration is often rewarding, granting valuable resources and loot, but I do not always have the time nor the energy to spend looking for a particular biome in which to search. While maps are useful, they're not ideal for pinpointing a location I have not yet visited. I need something more... directional. A compass?

pages.title: Crafting Recipe
pages.text: Able to read more than mere magnetic fields, its needle tracks the very climate of the world.
